activities: NCR operations in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland may transfer client data to its operations in the U.S. in connection with the provision of the NCR APTRA e-Marketing for Retail SaaS offering.  NCR’s operations in the U.S. act as a data processor with respect to information received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland, and may use that information for purposes that include but are not limited to: (i) fulfilling the requirements specified in the applicable contract between NCR and its customer; (ii) facilitating NCR’s compliance with its corporate governance and legal requirements; (iii) monitoring system performance; (iv) providing services and support; (v) testing the systems used to deliver its services; and (vi) developing and implementing upgrades to systems.
contacttitle1: Law Vice President, AGC & Chief Ethics & Compliance/Privacy Officer
corpofftitle1: Law Vice President, AGC & Chief Ethics & Compliance/Privacy Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client data related to the Aptra e-Marketing for Retail SaaS offering.  The data covered includes manually processed data.
